title: How Can I Get Unchained Alistar and Riot Tristana ? Help Pls
body:
hello riot . i have a question . How can i get Unchained Alistar and Riot Tristana ? 
Pls help cause i love that skin :D my account have 360 skin and i try to find that skin on hextech chest but i never see that :( thanks so much 
Sorry if my english bad . im from viet nam .

replies.body: follow riot on facebook and twitter

I can't really help much here on the Boards, but if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), one of our specialists will be happy to assist you. ^.^

Let me know if you run into any issues submitting your ticket.
